subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Russia named Yevgeny Plushenko, who has been struggling after surgery for back injuries, to its only men’s singles spot for the Sochi Games after a closed-door session.
snippet: Russia named Yevgeny Plushenko, who has been struggling after surgery for back injuries, to its only men’s singles spot for the Sochi Games after a closed-door session.
